articles.author: ICC
articles.title: Asia Cup 2023 schedule announced - ICC Cricket
articles.description: The schedule for the 2023 Asia Cup, co-hosted by Pakistan and Sri Lanka, is out with the tournament running from August 30 to September 17.
articles.content: The schedule for the 2023 Asia Cup, co-hosted by Pakistan and Sri Lanka, is out with the tournament running from August 30 to September 17.Pakistan will take on Nepal in the opening match of the 2023… [+2015 chars]

articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: Wrestler Bajrang Punia Gets Direct Asian Games Entry, Under-23 Asian Champ Hits Out - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Proving his point further, the Under-23 wrestler said he had recently defeated American John Michael Diakomihalis by a comprehensive 8-2 margin while Bajrang had lost to the same wrestler by technical superiority in the World Championships last year.
articles.content: The reigning U23 Asian champion Sujeet Kalkal on Wednesday slammed the IOA ad-hoc committee for granting direct entry to Bajrang Punia for the Asian Games, saying it was unfair on the next generation… [+1783 chars]
